query.value: ContainerLogV2 | where LogLevel == "info" | extend LogData = parse_json(LogMessage) | where isnotempty(LogData.inputs) | extend Alert = tostring(LogData.alert), Blocked = tostring(LogData.blocked), BlockedReasons = tostring(LogData.blocked_reasons), Categories = tostring(LogData.categories), Event = tostring(LogData.event), EventID = tostring(LogData.event_id), Frameworks = tostring(LogData.frameworks), Inputs = tostring(LogData.inputs), Response = tostring(LogData.response), FullInputs = tostring(LogData.modified_input), Model = tostring(LogData.model), Provider = tostring(LogData.provider), Policy = tostring(LogData.policy), Results = tostring(LogData.results), Verdict = tostring(LogData.verdict), Timestamp = tostring(LogData.timestamp) | project Timestamp, Alert, Blocked, BlockedReasons, Categories, Event, EventID, Frameworks, Inputs, Response, FullInputs, Model, Provider, Policy, Results, Verdict
